value.title: StarCraft 2: THE BEST OF THE BEST - Serral vs Maru, WTL Finals! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Watch as two of the best StarCraft 2 players in the world, Serral and Maru, face off in a best-of-3 series that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Who will emerge victorious in this epic showdown from the WTL? Find out in this video! Support my work: https://patreon.com/lowkotv Lowko Merch: https://lowko.shop
